description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form field 76068-Tumor Size Cannot be Determined.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TMR_SZ_GD_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size Greatest Dimension.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


For specimens with multiple tumors, give greatest dimension of each additional tumor
